channel.title: Scripture reflection on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in Scripture reflection on Zinzy's website

item.title: Sermon
item.description: I delivered this sermon today at All Saints Amsterdam. A few months ago, along with much of humanity, it seemed, I went to see Barbie. Walking out of the theatre and forming an opinion on this intro to feminism, I renamed the film to a title which I will use again today: “Blueprints: a pamphlet against simplicity”. It’s nice to see all of your faces here today. I’ve met most of you before, but let me make an official introduction.
